--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@y...> 
> >>After assassination of the older brother November 18th
> while moving aside the body to the Satsuma feudal clan residence, we
would like to aim for Kondo's assassination, you want.<<
> 
> Itou is killed and Suzuki retrieves his body and takes it to
someone's house, probably the house where their party (political
party, that is) was being headquartered since it's the clan residence.
 Suzuki wants to kill Kondou in vengeance (and begins planning?).

***ummmm he sides with Satsuma?!?

> >>On December 9th the Kondo road is attacked with the Kyoto ink
dyeing, but because it is injured, it ends.<<
> 
> What the heck is "Kyoto ink dyeing"?
> 
> Suzuki puts his plan into action and attacks Kondou, but is injured
in the attempt, so he gives up on trying to kill him.

***Kondo was shot in the shoulder.  This is mentioned on Japanese
sites and seems to be standard info...I'm not sure about the part
about Okita protecting him.  This was also shown in the Toshiro
Mifune's SHINSENGUMI!: Band of Assasins and mentioned in MIBUGISHIDEN

> >>It participated in Toba Fushimi war and the
> raising/holding soldier it did afterwards as red information party
second captain. In new selection group vengeance you had run about,
but without being able to carry out it received the restoration, was
Meiji and became the policeman, Tsuruoka chief of police era threw the
private funds to hospital construction.<<
> 
Phil:(was his family wealthy or was he just donating from his salary?
I've never heard anything about what his and Itou's background was).  

***yeah, talk about confusing...the reason why I don't think he became
Chief of Police is because on other sites about Saitou the webmasters
will always mention their direct superiors so like in Saitou's case
the Kawajii's babelfish name always comes up.  But who knows...maybe
he changed his name to Tsuruoka?!?  There is plenty of stuff on Itou
in Japanese but his bio is the most garbled so I never bothered to
post links.
> 
Phil:"In new selection group vengeance you had run about, but without
being able to carry out it received the restoration" --- any clues
anyone??  Is restoration referring to finding a direction in life
again (by finding a place in the police) OR are they saying that after
failing in his attempt at vengeance against the Shinsengumi, he was
reconciled to be able to accept possibly working with other former
Shinsengumi members who had also become police (though I can't EVER
see him being able to stomach Saitou, which may have been an
interesting dilemma for Kawaji)?  Or a combination of both concepts
maybe?  

***no,no,no I think Suzuki tried to seek revenge but failed to do so
and had to accept THE restoration of the emperor and new polticial
order.  I think the establishment of the modern police dept was quiete
extensive because we have info of which ward/region/dept Saitou was
assigned to...I'm sure everyone was scattered about although you never
know about those kenjutsu tournaments because in that bit of info
Saitou's opponent's dept was listed...fanfic possibility that one of
the 2 of Saitou's opponents was Suzuki under another name:)
> 
Phil:  Maybe it means that he was aimless after the assassination of
his brother, found a cause by fighting at Toba-Fushimi and joining the
Sekihoutai, then after the Sekihoutai debacle he was reconciled to the
Meiji Restoration (i.e. they "forgave" him being Sekihoutai like they
"forgave" former Shinsengumi and Aizu samurai and accepted them into
the police force)?

***That's why I think he changed his name...in the bigger picture in
terms of the Shinsengumi's activities Saitou was really involved and
he was kind of famous...while Suzuki's name doesn't turn up that much
so perhaps the police dept. didn't realize his background?

> >>After that rest of life you sent with Ishioka of the hometown and
1919, lived to 83 years old.<<
> 
> Okay, so he dies in 1919 at age 83 (wahoo!!!  Now I know... he's
older than Sagara, who was born in 1839).  But what is "sent with
Ishioka of the hometown"?

***he retired there?  Maybe his birthplace?

> Masayoshi and Serizawa Kamo
Okay...so you guys want some kind of contract right? :)

Serizawa, Tiffany/secretarytocapt3 will always patiently and
respectfully await for the day you tell us about Saitou in the Tenma
House affair business ^_^
